summary: App should persist user-generated data (uploaded books, profiles, posts/comments, admin uploads) across normal updates/redeploys (upgrades) without deletion.
architectural_notes: Use stable/persistent storage strategy so canister upgrades retain uploaded books, metadata, profiles, posts, comments, and admin uploads (avoid data loss on upgrade).

new_feature_requests.summary: Persist uploaded books and related metadata across updates/redeploys so uploads are not removed
Persist user profiles and ensure created profiles are saved and visible to the admin across updates

Ensure all user-generated and admin-managed data is preserved across normal canister upgrades/redeploys (i.e., code updates) so uploaded books and associated metadata are not removed after an upgrade.
Persist user profiles across normal canister upgrades/redeploys so profiles that users create remain saved and can be accessed by admin workflows after upgrades.

projectName: Persist uploaded books and user profiles across upgrades/redeploys
